mapper.select: select * from model where (username=#{param1} and model_name=#{param2})
select * from model where (username=#{param1} and algo_id=#{param2})
select * from model where (username=#{param1} and dataset_id=#{param2})
select * from model where (username=#{param1} and algo_id=#{param2} and dataset_id=#{param3})
mapper.delete: delete from model where username=#{param1} and model_name=#{param2}
